Room.Name: Golden Dolphin Way
Room.ShortDescription: You are on Golden Dolphin Way, running parallel to the south City Wall.
Room.LongDescription: Golden Dolphin Way runs parallel to the Southern City Wall for almost the entire span of the city. On the north side of the road, you can see some buildings in a shopping complex. Directly to the north, there is an elephant leather shop. The entrance to the shop is located on Rosecrest Street to the west. There are two more shops to the east.
